name: Fruit Lockers Reborn! 2
description:
An exciting match-3 twist! Fruit Lockers is back! Double your fun with Fruit Lockers Reborn! 2 - an exciting twist on the popular match-three puzzler. Swap colored lockers to open them and match fruits to reach your level goals. Play tons of challenging yet balanced levels. Unlock and earn powerful bonus items like the Hammer, Bubble, Bomb and Fruit Blaster.

- Innovative 2-layer match-three!
- 105 challenging levels
- Awesome bonus items
- Addicting gameplay, improve your records and beat yourself
- Timed and relaxed mode option
